changelog: v1.3.1 calc support, gen9 and bugfix

changelog: 1.5.5.1 the calc thing is back

if the extension does not work for you, please download this version -> https://github.com/pkmn/randbats/releases

Featuring information about your ingame opponent's potential set and stats, as well as calculations to quickly assist you in your decisions. Perfect for people who get quickly overwhelmed by the timer like me!

New damage calculator extension.
This extension shows the damage range of your own attacks.
Things it doesn't account for:
Enemy pokemons ability
Enemy pokemons item

New typecharts extension.

credit: Pre, pkmn.cc and @smogon/calc authors
